name: Grow the Love LD#34
description:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=47199

Ludum Dare #34 submission

Theme:Growing + Two button controls

Help some tiny people find their true soulmates in this matchmaking puzzle game. Be mindful of their companion preferences and match them up accordingly. Keep the population growing and watch the field fill up with flowers of passed loved ones.
